name: Bug Blast
overview: Published in FHD Software Twin Pack #7 aka Bug Blaster (not to be confused by the Alligata Software bug blaster by Antony Crowther that came out the same year) this version by Eric R. Smith is a centipede clone for one player. The title screen mentions that this game was online, but it is unclear if that indicates it was available on a BBS or on an early online system like CompuServe, which was in its infancy.
